summary: Three different love stories, set in three consecutive decades, in two neighbouring Balkan villages burdened with a long history of inter-ethnic hatred: this is a film about the dangers - and the enduring strength - of forbidden love.
cast: Tihana Lazovic|Goran Markovic|Nives Ivankovic|Dado Cosic|Stipe Radoja|Trpimir Jurkic|Mira Banjac|Slavko Sobin|Lukrecija Tudor|Tara Rosandic|Ksenija Marinkovic

title: Bajo el sol
